body.name: WALI Universal Wall Mount for Audio Visual Devices, Router, Game Consoles, Cable Modems, DVD Players and More, Fit 18 to 31 Inches Circumference (CBM-B), Black

features: Special Design: WALI T-Shaped Metal Wall Mount Holder specially designed for any device circumference up to 31 inches (78.7cm). Max weight up to 50 lbs (22.7kg) for drywall and 100 lbs (45.3kg) for wood studs, brick and concrete wall.
Features: Four prefabricated holes that perfectly align with provided 1.18 inch (3cm) wide nylon straps to secure devices neat and tight against the wall.
Quality: Strong metal T-shaped mount perfect for large devices including Game Consoles,speakers, small PC, and tools circumference 18 to 31 inches (78.7cm).
Easy to install in minutes with provided screws, anchors and straps included.

Package Includes: 1 x WALI T-Shaped Metal Wall Mount Holder (Black), Screw and Anchor x4, 1.18 inch (3cm) Wide Nylon Strap x2, User Manual x1, experienced and friendly US based customer support available to assist 7 days a week.
body.description: CBM-B T-Shaped Metal Wall Mount Holder Adjustable for Various Devices: Included straps support devices of circumference 18 to 31 inches. Suitable for game consoles,speakers, small PC, and more. High-quality & Safety: The wall mount is made of T-shaped metal with four prefabricated holes perfectly aligned with the 1.18-inch (3cm) wide nylon strips provided to secure the device and fit it tightly against the wall. Note: Check device dimensions before purchasing. Device circumference 18 to 31 inches. Max weight up to 50 lbs (22.7kg) for drywall. Max weight up to 100 lbs (45.3kg) for wood studs, brick and concrete wall. 1.18 inch (3cm) wide nylon straps.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose WALI? WALI is committed to building high-quality products and mounting solutions for every budget and everyone. From VESA display mounts to speaker mounts and projector mounts, our product collections achieve the optimal balance between functionality, design and value. CBM-B T-Shaped Metal Wall Mount Holder Adjustable for Various Devices: Included straps support devices of circumference 18 to 31 inches. Suitable for game consoles,speakers, small PC, and more. High-quality & Safety: The wall mount is made of T-shaped metal with four prefabricated holes perfectly aligned with the 1.18-inch (3cm) wide nylon strips provided to secure the device and fit it tightly against the wall. Note: Check device dimensions before purchasing. Device circumference 18 to 31 inches. Max weight up to 50 lbs (22.7kg) for drywall. Max weight up to 100 lbs (45.3kg) for wood studs, brick and concrete wall. 1.18 inch (3cm) wide nylon straps.

Adjustable Nylon Straps Suitable for device circumference 18 to 31 inches. Easy Installation This universal wall mount can be mounted to different types of walls. Width Adjustable This wall mount is adjustable up to 4 inches in width to fit more devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality, super sturdy, good size and easily installed. I wall mount tv’s weekly and find this product to be superior when hiding gaming units, cable base units, satellite receiver boxes, etc. super clean look and completely hides behind wall mounted tv’s. Customers are very satisfied with installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: It is a little flimsy when you putting one side in .. but it holds like it’s supposed too when both straps are on overall a good product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and a clean look.
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to do a review after I had it set up for 2 month and very happy with this product. Easy to use and works great with different shapes. The Velcro holds it in place very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product .... but ___
reviews.reviewText: Did not come with velcro strap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product fine, drywall anchors suck
reviews.reviewText: The product itself seems fine so far. But the provided drywall anchors are too big for the provided screws. I didn’t realize this until it was too late and now I have four massive holes in my wall and had to change where I was mounting it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with zip ties
reviews.reviewText: Our tv was already mounted onto a flagstone fireplace. So I used two long zip ties and fed them through the holes on this holder (which is metal). I then fed the ties through our tv mount. It worked perfect. I know it’s hard to tell from the pictures but this gadget is awesome. I used it for a dish box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Es lo mejor para organizar tu consola

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars velcro didn’t hold

reviews.reviewText: I used it to hold my security video camera system on the wall , i have ordered a second on for my battery back up UPS

reviews.reviewTitle: Not appropriate for Apple TV or smaller devices
reviews.reviewText: This unit is too large for an Apple TV or Android box. The holes for the straps are cut too far apart to securely hold the unit. Additionally, the velcro straps are too long for a smaller device; they have to be wrapped around the unit twice and there there is nowhere for the velcro to attach to.There were no instructions included in the packaging.A waste of my money!
